Panel
Yehuda Katz (twitter github blog) Avdi Grimm (twitter github blog book) Charles Max Wood (twitter github Teach Me To Code Rails Summer Camp) David Brady (blog twitter github ADDcasts) James Edward Gray (blog twitter github) Josh Susser (twitter github blog)
Discussion
jQuery Prototype.js Thomas Fuchs Scriptaculous Rails Merb Charles Jolley SproutCore Ember.js Backbone.js Amber (SmallTalk Dialect) Ruby Strobe ActionController Zen of Python Node.js Sinatra Rails as an API server Rack Middleware JSON as a View Layer Jbuilder Convention over Configuration JSON to_json is a problem serializer gem to_json is not a method, it's a class Presenter Erector Open Source Software Your job is to provide a level of abstraction that hides what you actually do A negative of using Github. People assume that large projects work like their small project. Project Politics Rails' Asset Pipeline
